about.title: About Me
about.content: Full-stack Developer with nearly 2 years of experience specializing in Next.js. I started with frontend development and now work on end-to-end projects. I am open to learning new technologies and continuously improving my skills.

projects.title: Projects
projects.content_1: A website for the Conqueror's Blade gaming community, designed to manage users and share experiences with other players.
projects.content_2: A website created for programming practice. Project from FrontendMentor.io
projects.content_3: A tool for filtering reports from Excel files to display on a webpage, with the option to download the sorted report.
projects.content_4: A simple TODO list with options to add and remove tasks.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content_1: Rebuilt the frontend part of an older blog portal by modernizing legacy JavaScript code and implementing new technologies to improve the website's performance and modernity.
experience.content_2: This is my third term at the Academy of the Future. Initially, I worked directly with a child, then managed a small team of leaders, and currently support the Manager in Academy activities in Silesia.
experience.role_2: Volunteer, Regional Coordinator, Deputy Operations Manager,
